ExpSyntax.val: InStr ({1,3},'M')>0 AND {1,4}<>'Q' AND (VarMod ('{0,2}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,9}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,16}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,23}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,24}'VAR))

Text.val: Amount must be a positive number
Data has changed ... ask for confirmation
Data has not changed ... just exit

ExpSyntax.val: VarMod ('{5,2}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,9}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,16}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,23}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,24}'VAR)
MlsTrans ('New authorization was introduced to ING CF authorizations by user :')&' '&User (0)
